name: Jamdung Jamaica Charades!
description:
Finally a Jamaican version of a Charades named Jamdung . This is an official Charades app for Jamaicans and people interested in Jamaica and it's culture. So get your friends, get ready let's have fun with Jamdung.

This game is great for friends teaming up while doing multiple activity for you and your friends with different challenges from Name the place, Singing, Acting and name the Reggae and Dancehall artiste .

Start the game guess the word on the card that's on your head from your friends' clues before the timer runs out! Invite friends over your house, play while your out with friends or play randomly with someone when you have time to spare! Play Jamdung the best Jamaican Charade App !
